name: Simic Hybrid
description: The Simic Combine uses magic to fuse different life forms together. As a Simic hybrid, you are a product of this magical science, enhanced with characteristics from animals.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

choiceOptions.label: Choose one other ability score to increase by 1

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Animal Enhancement (Level 1)
traits.description: Your body has been altered to incorporate certain animal characteristics. You choose one of the following enhancements: Manta Glide, Nimble Climber, or Underwater Adaptation.

traits.name: Animal Enhancement (Level 5)
traits.description: At 5th level, you choose a second animal enhancement: Grappling Appendages, Carapace, or Acid Spit.
